text: Ostrovica may refer to: * Ostrovica, Croatia, village in Croatia, near Benkovac, in Lišane Ostrovičke municipality ** Ostrovica Fortress, a castle in Croatia * Ostrovica, Bosnia and Herzegovina, village in Bosnia, near Kulen Vakuf ** Ostrovica Castle, a castle in Bosnia and Herzegovina * Ostrovica (Niška Banja), village in Serbia, near Niš * Ostrovica (Rudnik), a castle in Serbia * Ostrovica, Hrpelje-Kozina, village in Slovenia * Oštrovica, village in Croatia, near Delnice
title: Ostrovica
